|brand = BeagleBoard |model = xM |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (rev C) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;DM3730; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SD Card |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT46H128M32L2KQ-5; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = SMSC;LAN9514;LAN9514-JZX; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 2E:10:F5
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2011.12-00006;-gb1fd369; |stockos = Linux;3.0.14;Angstrom v2012.01-core;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD card slot |exp_usb_num = 5 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, DB9,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, P3
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = S-Video, DVI-D, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), GPIO, |addchip = USB 2.0 ULPI Transceiver;SMSC;USB3320;;1; ,,, Flat-panel Display Digital Transmitter;TI;TFP410PAP;;1; ,,, Current Limited Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2054BD;;1; ,,, USB Peripheral Power Management;Texas Instruments;TPS2141;;1; ,,, Integrated Power Management and Audio Codec;TI;TPS65950;;1; ,,, Overvoltage Protection Controller;ON Semiconductor;NCP349;;2; ,,, 2-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXS0102DCUR;;2; ,,, 3V to 5.5V Single Channel RS232 Transceiver;TI;SN65C3221;;1; ,,, Dual Buffer and Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC2G07;;1; ,,, 1.5A Low Dropout Regulator;Texas Instruments;TL1963A;;2; ,,, Dual Inverter Buffer and Driver;TI;SN74LVC2G06;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2010 |estprice = 149 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00DK2C8GE |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{seealso|BeagleBoard}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[TI]] AM3730 @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A8) Processor *RAM: 512MB (LPDDR3), 2D/3D graphics accelerator *Connectivity: 4x USB 2.0 ports (Mini USB A/B) :MMC/SD Card slot, DVI-D, S-Video, Ethernet ports
The board can be powered by 2 different methods: *5V/2A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Mini-B (when powered via USB :the 4x USB Type A ports will not function) {{see also|List of SBCs}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://elinux.org/Beagleboard:BeagleBoard-xM ''BeagleBoard-xM'' on '''eLinux'''] (Rev A2/A3/B/C/C1/C2)
==See also== :https://beagleboard.org/boards *[[BeagleBone Black]] • [https://beagleboard.org/black PPage] *[[BeagleBone Blue]] • [https://beagleboard.org/blue PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green|BeagleBone Green]] • [http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/Beaglebone_green PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green Wireless|BeagleBone Green WiFi]] • [https://www.seeedstudio.com/SeeedStudio-BeagleBone-Green-Wireless-p-2650.html PPage] *[[BeagleBoard X15]] • [https://beagleboard.org/x15 PPage] *[[BeagleBoard xM]] • [https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard-xm PPage] *[[PocketBeagle]] • [https://beagleboard.org/pocket PPage]
